Question: After Urban Cowboy, this person starred in a series of financial and critical failures that sidelined his acting career.
Hints: At age 24, this person became one of the youngest performers ever nominated for the Best Actor Oscar.
This person is a certified private pilot and owns five aircraft, including an ex-Qantas Boeing 707–138 airliner.
In May 2012, an anonymous masseur filed a lawsuit against this person citing claims of sexual assault and battery.
